name: Dungeon Cleaner (MOLFOX)
description:
YOU ENTER INTO A LAYER OF YOUR MASTER'S DUNGEON THAT YOU'VE NEVER SEEN BEFORE.  ITS A MESS...

Dungeon Cleaner is a text-based dungeon crawler in which you roam a dungeon while cleaning up all the carnage left behind by adventurers who explored before you.

PRO TIP: Feel free to keep a paper and pencil nearby to keep track of your surroundings!

THIS PROJECT REQUIRES PYTHON TO LAUNCH

when opened in IDE's such as Pycharm, you will get the source code.

Cover Art ASCII Done by Me

 Reference Image:  Cleaner Janitor Worker by Derplan Xii

Credits available on start screen
